house_listing.house_description: One of the Last DOUBLE lots in Downtown Birmingham!! Will accomodate a 7,200 square foot renovation. Sits handsomely on the corner of Lincoln and Bates. 1916 Dutch Colonial. LAND CONTRACT TERMS! Seller will help participate in renovation for profit percentage! Call Marc at 248-931-7713
house_listing.agent_name: Dr. Marc Leitson Dr. Marc Leitson

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Dining Room, Living Room, Master Bedroom
